game.name: Sniper Ultimate Assassin
game.description:
Congratulations! You have been assigned to take care of the worldâ€™s deadliest assassins. Do you have the skill to accept this challenging task right away? If yes, join Sniper Ultimate Assassin and get ready to go on the extremely difficult and thrilling missions of your life. Click the play button and begin your shooting journey by grabbing your new weapon! You have to complete all your future missions with the help of this gun. There are multiple types of rifles to use in this action-packed game. 
Grab a rifle that is good to shoot target at a short distance in usual conditions! In each level, you have a different mission to complete. Try to eliminate the target while performing each mission! Your agent will help to make your way throughout the mission. Make sure not to kill him if you want to complete your mission. The dresses of your agent will be a little bit different from the ones that your target wear. It is up to you to clean your city from a horde of dangerous criminals. 
Your good command on how to aim your target perfectly will help complete all the levels fast in this HTML5 addictive shooting game. You are not alone since a high power sniper rifle is there to protect you. Remember you will have only one bullet to shoot your target in each mission so use your gun nicely in this superb sniper game. In the advanced levels, you have to face off multiple enemies to deal with. Pay focus to the details and complete each mission quickly! Check out other free gun shooting games for boys online on atmegame.com and have a blast without download!
